title: Single-product shirt storefront with Cash App instruction modal

requirements.text: Create a single product page storefront to sell one shirt for $25.

quotes: Make a website selling this shirt for 25$

acceptanceCriteria: The app has a single visible product page (no additional pages required).
The page clearly displays the product price as "$25".
The page includes a primary call-to-action button labeled "Buy Now".

requirements.text: Use the two uploaded images exactly as provided as the product photos (front and back views).

quotes: yes I want  the two uploaded images used as the front and back product photos exactly as shown

acceptanceCriteria: Both uploaded images (Photoroom_20260118_154454.jpeg and Photoroom_20260118_154454-1.jpeg) are included as static frontend assets and render on the product page.
Users can view both images as front/back product photos (e.g., gallery, carousel, or selectable thumbnails).
No visual edits are applied to the images (cropping/resizing for layout is allowed, but the image content must not be altered).

requirements.text: Implement a “Buy Now” interaction that opens a popup modal with manual Cash App payment instructions to send $25 to $bslimeballin and a statement that the product will be sent after payment is received.

quotes: the buy now should appear as a pop up modal
open a page telling user to sent 25$ to bslimeballin saying once payment is sent product will be sent

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the "Buy Now" button opens a modal (not a separate page).
The modal text instructs the user to send exactly $25 to Cash App cashtag "$bslimeballin".
The modal includes a clear note that the product will be sent after payment is received.
The modal provides a close action (e.g., X button and/or Close button) and can be dismissed via Escape key.
No claim is made that the app performs direct Cash App payment processing.

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme appropriate for a streetwear product page (avoid default template look), using a consistent color palette, typography, and spacing across the page and modal.

quotes: Make a website selling this shirt for 25$

acceptanceCriteria: The product page and modal share a consistent visual style (colors, type scale, button styling).
The theme does not rely on a blue/purple gradient default aesthetic.
The layout is responsive and remains usable on mobile widths.

constraints: Do not implement or claim direct Cash App payment integration; only manual payment instructions are supported.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Backend must remain single-actor if any backend work is added (no multi-service architecture).
nonGoals: Inventory management, order tracking, shipping label generation, or automated fulfillment.
Real payment processing (Stripe, Cash App API, or any external payment API integration).
Multi-page shop routing (Home/About/Contact pages) beyond the single product page requested.
